name: Before It Explodes
description:
Before It Explodes is a simple yet challenging top-down action game, play as a slime who discovers a bomb inside him and now he has to get it out before it explodes!

Your objective is to get smaller to the point that you can take the bomb out of you. To make this, divide yourself and kill the others slimes before they try to merge with you!

This game was made for MiniJam 111.

Play on fullscreen for a better experience.

Controls:

Move: WASD

Attack: Left Click or Space

Dodge: Right Click or Shift

Pause Game: Esc
